name: universalblog
description: A fullstack MERN blog application  # Features * Login functionality with password and username * Logout functionality * CRUD operations * Write a post with image and text * Publish post * Create profile with image * update profile * delete account * Read the blog posts * Sign in for the new users * Mongodb to store the data * CSS for styling  * Postman to test API * Created REST Api * Used bcrypt for password security * Used nodemon for automatically restarting the application

scripts.build: cd api && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && npm run build
